price: И борите се на Аллаховом путу и знајте да Аллах све чује и све зна.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
